messages.message: We have been talking about this for a long time, and itâ€™s amazing that we can finally use ibdev-backend sandboxes to run Cypress tests!!

It is in deadlock for my PR:
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73482

My sandbox is up and running, so it tries to restore database from a snapshot which were never created
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/actions/runs/16923381657/job/47954232823?pr=73482
```Resuming sandbox pr-73482
Already resumed! Name: pr-73482 Version: 185b227acdd9ff42 ID: d2dqvln23tvs739bc740
...

Restoring DB snapshot pr-73482-init
No matching found for "pr-73482-init"
Error: Process completed with exit code 1.```
As the result each run fails almost immediately
Yep, i have a PR for the fix: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73615

Cool!
One qq: what is the use case which we try to solve by restoring the DB by default? Won't we introduce new issues if we restore unclean DB before test runs?
Mainly to speed things up. But since seeding DB is fairly fast (<2 mins), it's better to just drop and recreate upon each run

BTW they seems to be blocking:
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73482
(can't merge my change rn)

Yep, should be addressed with https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1755037657115399 (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1755037657115399)
It's blocking because the new cypress GH and the old GH both have the `results` steps, which is currently set to merge blocking. This PR renames the step: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73621 (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73621)
@Xindi Xu what can I do to unblock? Will this be merged soon?
You can delete the crafting sandbox and re-run the Github action.
We just need to update the config in GitHub to make it non blocking
and one more thing, for results cypress test failure what can I do to unblock? or does that use the same sandbox and as long as I delete and rerun it should work
Can anyone stamp this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73621)? It should help unblock
Merged! You might need to rebase master
